title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, push, list and delete models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package integrating Ollama models into LangChain’s LLM, chat and embeddings interfaces.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (ChatGPT-style) with model management, chat history, multimodal and RAG support.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming and embeddings support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list and delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for Ollama with syntax highlighting, history and model switching.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models for QA, RAG and agent pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for fine-tuning, RAG, function-calling, Docker & k8s deployment.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & GPU) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-gpt4all
summary: Bridge library that exposes GPT4All models through the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial but actively maintained Rust crate for Ollama with Tokio streaming support.

title: ollama-spring-boot-starter
summary: Spring Boot auto-configuration that injects an Ollama template service for Java backends.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package for Ollama: generate and chat APIs with streaming for mobile apps.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server that wraps Ollama so Claude Desktop can call local LLMs.

title: ollama-express
summary: Express.js middleware that adds an OpenAI-compatible `/v1/chat/completions` endpoint backed by Ollama.
